title: Increase Your Capacity for Deep Work | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community.  If you want your question answered by Tom in an AMA, Please submit your questions in advance to connect@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”.    Just announced our Comic Book collaboration with Steve Aoki, called Neon Future! Pre-order your copy of the comic book here: comics.impacttheory.com Be sure to follow along with Impact Theory Comics on Instagram as we continue our journey to create a studio that will rival Disney: http://bit.ly/2BwgFam   Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by:   Blinkist. Visit www.blinkist.com/IMPACT to try out the premium service completely free for 7 days! Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact FitPlan: Go to Fitplanapp.com/subscribe and use discount code: IMPACT to get 30 days completely free. Sanebox. Visit sanebox.com/IMPACT to sign up for your 14-day free trial and receive a $25 credit. SaneBox brings sanity back to your inbox by prioritizing what's important, removing spam/junk, grouping newsletters together, and automating tedious tasks.   PEOPLE MENTIONED David Goggins: http://bit.ly/2NRpkcF [11:52]   BOOKS MENTIONED Neon Future Comic: http://bit.ly/2MM3qmc Deep Work by Cal Newport: https://amzn.to/2plEwkb [7:44] Can't Hurt Me by David Goggins: https://amzn.to/2plHmG7 [13:49] Thirst by Scott Harrison: https://amzn.to/2MO9QSd [26:33]     QUESTION TOPICS Tom goes into how detail about diaphragm breathing [4:38] Why Cal Newport's limit of how long someone can do 'deep work' is a limiting belief [7:44] How to cultivate a passion when you have multiple interests [11:16] Tom breaks down his process of building his first comic book [16:19] How to apply your thoughts from paper/journaling to real life action [21:02] What Tom's diet currently looks like [24:16] Tom gives advice on how to throw a successful philanthropic event [26:07] How Tom remembers the learnings from what he reads [28:03]
